posts.name: Adv. Sanjida Rahman
posts.description: Adv. Sanjida rahman is a renowned Devorce, Family, Relation Law Specialist in Bangladesh Supreme Court.Adv. Sanjida rahman is currently working as a Devorce Lawyer in Supreme Court Bangladesh. Adv. Sanjida rahman has completed LLB at IIUC, LLM at Dhaka University. She has also completed PHD in Oxfort University. She is a founder of mini law school. She is a highly qualified lawyer in Bangladesh. She is advisor of dept. of law in IIUC. The chamber address of Adv. Sanjida rahman is: Bangladesh Supreme Court,3rd floor,room no-1, Dhaka.
posts.address: Bangladesh Supreme Court,3rd floor,room no-1, Dhaka.
